Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

::Dragoon::
       He's looking down and spots Hot Rod rising behind him.  He sighs and 
stops moving.  He emits a thin field of energy around his body (basically a 
shield, only effective against non energy attacks).  He turns and fires 4 
shots at Hot Rod from the middle of his stomach. (Why, you ask?  Because he 
can!)

--part1_170.5367a21.29419392_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
